dict.acceptation: 注意，观察；话语；评论，谈论，；

sent.orig: Remark: Remark:Used to illuminate moist wet places such as deck and passage of ship or cabin.
sent.trans: 说明：适用于船舶甲板、走道等潮湿场所或舱室照明。
那是一条无伤大雅的评注。

sent.orig: His flattering remark brought a blush in to her cheeks.
sent.trans: 他那阿谀奉承的话使她羞得双颊通红。

sent.orig: An awkward pause followed his remark.
sent.trans: 他讲了话，接着是一片让人尴尬的沉寂。

sent.orig: His hostility to the woman found vent in a sharp remark.
sent.trans: 他用尖刻的话语发泄对那个女人的敌意。
